-- retrieveMmInSearchInfo M/M 입력 목록조회 (당월) (내가 참여중인 과제) with tmp_tssInfo as ( SELECT DISTINCT a.wbs_cd, a.tss_cd FROM IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST a /* 과제관리마스터 */ INNER JOIN IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR b /* 과제참여연구원 */ ON (a.TSS_CD = b.TSS_CD) WHERE a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.tss_scn_cd = 'G' AND a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG' AND a.prj_cd not in ('PRJ00004','PRJ00014','PRJ00022','PRJ00038','PRJ00059', 'PRJ00090','PRJ00102' ) AND #{searchMonth} between left(b.PTC_STRT_DT, 7) and left(b.PTC_FNH_DT, 7) AND a.sa_sabun_new = #{_userSabun} )
select 0 as chk ,m.PRJ_CD as prjCd ,m.prj_nm as prjNm ,m.tss_cd as tssCd ,m.TSS_NM as tssNm ,m.TSS_STRT_DD as tssStrtDd ,case when m.TSS_FNH_DD = '9999-12-31' then '' else m.TSS_FNH_DD end as tssFnhDd ,isnull(f.PTC_PRO, 0) as prePtcPro ,isnull(b.PTC_PRO, 0) as ptcPro ,b.COMM_TXT as commTxt ,(case when b.tss_cd is null then 'N' else 'Y' end) as clsDataYn ,isnull(b.TO_DO_YN, case when ISNULL(b.MM_YYMM, #{searchMonth}) > '2017-12' then 'N' else 'Y' end ) as clsToDoYn ,isnull(b.MM_YYMM, #{searchMonth} ) as mmYymm ,#{_userSabun} as saSabunNew ,isnull(b.OUSD_TSS_YN, 'N') as ousdTssYn ,isnull(b.CLS_YN, case when ISNULL(b.MM_YYMM, #{searchMonth}) > '2017-12' then 'N' else 'Y' end) as clsYn ,m.WBS_CD as tssWbsCd ,m.seq from ( select a.prj_cd ,dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd) as prj_nm ,a.tss_cd ,a.tss_nm ,a.wbs_cd ,case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'DC' then DCAC_B_STRT_DD when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' then CMPL_B_STRT_DD else a.TSS_STRT_DD end TSS_STRT_DD ,case when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'DC' then DCAC_B_FNH_DD when a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'CM' then CMPL_B_FNH_DD else a.TSS_FNH_DD end TSS_FNH_DD ,0 seq from iris_tss_mgmt_mst a where a.tss_cd in (select tss_cd from tmp_tssInfo)
UNION
select b.PRJ_CD ,b.prj_nm ,b.tss_cd ,b.prj_nm AS tss_nm ,b.WBS_CD ,b.PATC_STR_DT TSS_STRT_DD ,b.PATC_END_DT TSS_FNH_DD ,0 seq from ( select a.prj_cd ,dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd) as prj_nm ,a.prj_cd as tss_cd /*,dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd) as tss_nm*/ ,a.wbs_cd ,a.PATC_STR_DT ,case when a.PATC_END_DT = '' or a.PATC_END_DT is null then '9999-12-31' else a.PATC_END_DT end as PATC_END_DT from IRIS_PRJ_TMMR_INFO a /* 프로젝트 인원정보 */ where a.TMMR_EMP_NO = #{_userSabun} and a.prj_cd in ( select prj_cd from iris_prj_rsst_mst where tclg_yn = 'N' ) ) b where 1=1 and #{searchMonth} between left(b.PATC_STR_DT, 7) and left(b.PATC_END_DT, 7)
UNION
select a.prj_cd ,dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd) as prj_nm ,a.TSS_CD ,b.TSS_NM ,b.WBS_CD ,b.TSS_STRT_DD ,b.TSS_FNH_DD ,0 seq from IRIS_MM_CLS a inner join IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST b on b.TSS_CD = a.TSS_CD where a.sa_sabun_new = #{_userSabun} and a.MM_YYMM = #{searchMonth} and a.OUSD_TSS_YN = 'Y'
UNION
SELECT b.PRJ_CD ,b.prj_nm ,b.tss_cd ,a.prj_nm + d.wbs_cd_p_nm AS TSS_NM ,d.WBS_CD_P as wbs_cd ,b.PATC_STR_DT ,b.PATC_END_DT ,d.seq FROM IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST a JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_DST d ON (a.PRJ_CD = d.PRJ_CD AND a.WBS_CD = d.WBS_CD AND d.DEL_YN = 'N' AND #{searchMonth} >= left(d.PATC_STR_DT, 7) ) JOIN ( select a.prj_cd ,dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd) as prj_nm ,a.prj_cd as tss_cd /*,dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd) as tss_nm*/ ,a.wbs_cd ,a.PATC_STR_DT ,case when a.PATC_END_DT = '' or a.PATC_END_DT is null then '9999-12-31' else a.PATC_END_DT end as PATC_END_DT from IRIS_PRJ_TMMR_INFO a where a.TMMR_EMP_NO = #{_userSabun} and a.prj_cd in ( select prj_cd from iris_prj_rsst_mst where tclg_yn = 'N' ) ) b ON (a.PRJ_CD = b.PRJ_CD AND a.WBS_CD = b.WBS_CD) WHERE 1=1 and #{searchMonth} between left(b.PATC_STR_DT, 7) and left(b.PATC_END_DT, 7)
) m left outer join iris_mm_cls b on b.tss_cd = m.tss_Cd and b.prj_cd = m.prj_Cd and b.wbs_cd = m.WBS_CD and b.sa_sabun_new = #{_userSabun} and b.mm_yymm = #{searchMonth} LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_MM_CLS F ON F.TSS_CD = m.tss_Cd and F.prj_cd = m.prj_Cd and f.wbs_cd = m.WBS_CD AND F.SA_SABUN_NEW = #{_userSabun} AND F.MM_YYMM = convert(nvarchar(7), dateadd(mm, -1, convert(datetime, #{searchMonth}+'-01')), 23) ORDER BY prjCd, seq

-- retrieveMmInBeforeSearchInfo (전월) select DISTINCT 0 as 'chk' ,a.PRJ_CD as prjCd ,dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd) as prjNm ,a.sa_sabun_new as saSabunNew ,isnull(b.prj_cd, c.TSS_CD) as tssCd ,isnull(b.prj_nm, c.TSS_NM) as tssNm ,isnull(b.prj_str_dt, c.TSS_STRT_DD) as tssStrtDd ,isnull(b.prj_end_dt, c.TSS_FNH_DD) as tssFnhDd ,isnull(f.PTC_PRO, 0) as prePtcPro ,a.PTC_PRO as ptcPro ,'Y' as clsDataYn ,convert(nvarchar(max), a.comm_txt) as commTxt ,a.CLS_YN as clsYn ,a.OUSD_TSS_YN as ousdTssYn ,a.TO_DO_YN as toDoYn ,isnull(b.wbs_cd, c.WBS_CD) as tssWbsCd ,isnull(b.seq, 0) as seq from IRIS_MM_CLS a left outer join ( SELECT bb.PRJ_CD ,bb.WBS_CD ,bb.PRJ_NM ,bb.PRJ_STR_DT ,bb.PRJ_END_DT ,0 AS seq FROM IRIS_MM_CLS aa JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST bb ON (aa.PRJ_CD = bb.PRJ_CD AND aa.WBS_CD = bb.WBS_CD) WHERE 1 = 1 UNION SELECT bb.PRJ_CD ,dd.WBS_CD_P AS WBS_CD ,bb.PRJ_NM + dd.wbs_cd_p_nm AS PRJ_NM ,bb.PRJ_STR_DT ,bb.PRJ_END_DT ,seq FROM IRIS_MM_CLS aa JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST bb ON (aa.PRJ_CD = bb.PRJ_CD AND aa.WBS_CD = bb.WBS_CD) JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_DST dd ON (bb.PRJ_CD = dd.PRJ_CD AND bb.WBS_CD = dd.WBS_CD AND dd.DEL_YN = 'N' AND #{searchMonth} >= left(dd.PATC_STR_DT, 7) ) WHERE aa.WBS_CD IN (bb.WBS_CD, dd.WBS_CD_P) AND bb.PRJ_CD = dd.PRJ_CD AND bb.WBS_CD = dd.WBS_CD ) b on b.PRJ_CD = a.PRJ_CD AND b.WBS_CD = a.WBS_CD left outer join IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST c on c.DEL_YN ='N' and c.TSS_CD = a.TSS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_MM_CLS F ON F.prj_cd = a.prj_cd AND F.WBS_CD = A.WBS_CD AND F.TSS_CD = A.TSS_CD AND F.SA_SABUN_NEW = A.SA_SABUN_NEW AND F.MM_YYMM = convert(nvarchar(7), dateadd(mm, -1, convert(datetime, #{searchMonth}+'-01')), 23) where a.MM_YYMM = #{searchMonth} and a.sa_sabun_new = #{_userSabun} ORDER BY prjCd, seq

-- retrieveMmClsSearchInfo M/M 마감 목록조회 (당월) with tmp_mmInfo as ( select m.prjCd ,m.prjNm ,m.tssCd ,m.tssWbsCd ,m.tssNm ,m.saSabunNew ,m.saName ,m.deptCode ,m.uperdeptName ,m.saUser ,m.mailUser ,m.type ,isnull(b.CLS_DT, '') as clsDt ,isnull(b.CLS_YN, 'N') as clsYn ,isnull(b.ILCK_ST, 'N') as ilckSt ,isnull(b.PTC_PRO, 0) as ptcPro ,isnull(f.ptc_pro, 0) as prePtcPro ,isnull(b.MM_YYMM, #{searchMonth}) as mmYymm ,convert(nvarchar(max), b.comm_txt) as commTxt ,isnull(b.TO_DO_YN, 'N') as toDoYn from ( select a.PRJ_CD as prjCd ,case when a.prj_cd in ('PRJ00021','PRJ00015','PRJ00002', 'PRJ00025','PRJ00026') then a.prj_nm else substring(dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd), CHARINDEX ('.', dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd)) +1, len(dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd)) ) end as prjNm ,b.TSS_CD as tssCd ,a.WBS_CD as tssWbsCd ,a.TSS_NM as tssNm ,b.sa_sabun_new as saSabunNew ,dbo.fn_getSabunName(b.sa_sabun_new) as saName ,(select dept_cd from iris_prj_rsst_mst where prj_cd = a.prj_cd) as deptCode ,(select distinct dept_name from iris_sso_dept where dept_code = a.dept_code and ps_flag <> 'D') as uperdeptName ,c.sa_user as saUser ,c.sa_mail as mailUser , '1' as type from IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST a inner join ( select distinct tss_cd ,sa_sabun_new from IRIS_TSS_PTC_RSST_MBR a where #{searchMonth} between left(PTC_STRT_DT, 7) and left(PTC_FNH_DT, 7) ) b on a.TSS_CD = b.TSS_CD inner join iris_sso_user c on c.sa_sabun_new = b.sa_sabun_new and c.sso_ex_flag <> 'D' where a.TSS_SCN_CD ='G' and a.PGS_STEP_CD = 'PG'
UNION
select a.prj_cd as prjCd ,case when b.prj_cd in ('PRJ00021','PRJ00015','PRJ00002', 'PRJ00025','PRJ00026') then b.prj_nm else substring(dbo.fn_getPrjName(b.prj_cd), CHARINDEX ('.', dbo.fn_getPrjName(b.prj_cd)) +1, len(dbo.fn_getPrjName(b.prj_cd)) ) end as prjNm ,a.tss_cd as tssCd ,b.wbs_cd as tssWbsCd ,b.tss_nm as tssNm ,a.sa_sabun_new as saSabunNew ,dbo.fn_getSabunName(a.sa_sabun_new) as saName ,(select dept_cd from iris_prj_rsst_mst where prj_cd = b.prj_cd) as deptCode ,(select distinct dept_name from iris_sso_dept where dept_code = b.dept_code and ps_flag <> 'D') as uperdeptName ,c.sa_user as saUser ,c.sa_mail as mailUser , '1' as type from IRIS_MM_CLS a inner join iris_tss_mgmt_mst b on b.tss_cd = a.tss_cd inner join iris_sso_user c on c.sa_sabun_new = a.sa_sabun_new and c.sso_ex_flag <> 'D' where a.MM_YYMM = #{searchMonth} and a.OUSD_TSS_YN ='Y'
UNION
select a.PRJ_CD as prjCd ,case when a.prj_cd in ('PRJ00021','PRJ00015','PRJ00002', 'PRJ00025','PRJ00026') then a.prj_nm else substring(dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd), CHARINDEX ('.', dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd)) +1, len(dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd)) ) end as prjNm ,a.prj_cd as tssCd ,a.WBS_CD as tssWbsCd ,a.PRJ_NM as tssNm ,b.TMMR_EMP_NO as saSabunNew ,dbo.fn_getSabunName(b.TMMR_EMP_NO) as saName ,a.dept_cd as deptCode ,(select dept_name from iris_sso_dept where dept_code = a.DEPT_UPER) as uperdeptName , c.sa_user as saUser , c.sa_mail as mailUser , 2 as type from IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST a inner join IRIS_PRJ_TMMR_INFO b on a.WBS_CD = b.WBS_CD and #{searchMonth} between left(b.PATC_STR_DT, 7) and left(case when b.PATC_END_DT = '' then '9999-12-31' when b.PATC_END_DT is null then '9999-12-31' else b.PATC_END_DT end , 7) inner join IRIS_SSO_USER c on c.sa_sabun_new = b.TMMR_EMP_NO and c.sso_ex_flag <> 'D' where a.TCLG_YN = 'N' and #{searchMonth} between left(a.PRJ_STR_DT, 7) and left( case when a.PRJ_END_DT = '' then '9999-12-31' when a.PRJ_END_DT is null then '9999-12-31' else a.PRJ_END_DT end , 7)
UNION
select a.PRJ_CD as prjCd ,case when a.prj_cd in ('PRJ00021','PRJ00015','PRJ00002', 'PRJ00025','PRJ00026') then a.prj_nm else substring(dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd), CHARINDEX ('.', dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd)) +1, len(dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd)) ) end as prjNm ,a.prj_cd as tssCd ,d.WBS_CD_P as tssWbsCd ,a.prj_nm + d.wbs_cd_p_nm AS TSS_NM ,b.TMMR_EMP_NO as saSabunNew ,dbo.fn_getSabunName(b.TMMR_EMP_NO) as saName ,a.dept_cd as deptCode ,(select dept_name from iris_sso_dept where dept_code = a.DEPT_UPER) as uperdeptName , c.sa_user as saUser , c.sa_mail as mailUser , d.seq + 2 as type from IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST a INNER JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_DST d ON (a.PRJ_CD = d.PRJ_CD AND a.WBS_CD = d.WBS_CD AND d.DEL_YN = 'N' AND #{searchMonth} >= left(d.PATC_STR_DT, 7) ) inner join IRIS_PRJ_TMMR_INFO b on a.WBS_CD = b.WBS_CD and #{searchMonth} between left(b.PATC_STR_DT, 7) and left(case when b.PATC_END_DT = '' then '9999-12-31' when b.PATC_END_DT is null then '9999-12-31' else b.PATC_END_DT end , 7) inner join IRIS_SSO_USER c on c.sa_sabun_new = b.TMMR_EMP_NO and c.sso_ex_flag <> 'D' where a.TCLG_YN = 'N' and #{searchMonth} between left(a.PRJ_STR_DT, 7) and left( case when a.PRJ_END_DT = '' then '9999-12-31' when a.PRJ_END_DT is null then '9999-12-31' else a.PRJ_END_DT end , 7) ) m left outer join IRIS_MM_CLS b on b.PRJ_CD = m.prjCd and b.tss_cd = m.tssCd and b.wbs_cd = m.tssWbsCd and b.sa_sabun_new = m.saSabunNew and b.MM_YYMM = #{searchMonth} LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_MM_CLS F ON F.TSS_CD = m.tssCd and F.prj_cd = m.prjCd and F.wbs_cd = m.tssWbsCd AND F.SA_SABUN_NEW = m.saSabunNew AND F.MM_YYMM = convert(nvarchar(7), dateadd(mm, -1, convert(datetime, #{searchMonth}+'-01')), 23) )
select DISTINCT * from tmp_mmInfo where 1=1
AND prjCd IN (SELECT PRJ_CD FROM IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST WHERE DEPT_CD = ( select distinct team_dept_code from vw_sso_dept where dept_code =#{_userDept} ) )
and prjNm like '%'+#{searchDeptName}+'%'
and ptcPro = 0
and clsYn = #{selClsYn}
order by prjCd, saName, type

-- retrieveMmOutBeforeSearchInfo (전월) select DISTINCT m.* from ( select case when left(a.TSS_CD, 3) = 'PRJ' then 2 else 1 end as type ,a.prj_cd as prjCd ,isnull(c.TSS_CD, b.PRJ_CD) as tssCd ,dbo.fn_getPrjName(a.prj_cd) as prjNm ,isnull(c.tss_nm, b.prj_nm ) as tssNm ,a.sa_sabun_new as saSabunNew ,a.CLS_DT as clsDt ,isnull(a.CLS_YN, 'N') as clsYn ,isnull(a.ILCK_ST, 'N') as ilckSt ,isnull(a.TO_DO_YN, 'N') as toDoYn ,isnull(a.PTC_PRO, 0) as ptcPro ,convert(nvarchar(max), a.COMM_TXT) as commTxt ,b.wbs_cd as wbsCd ,isnull(c.WBS_CD, b.WBS_CD) as tssWbsCd ,u.sa_user as mailUser ,u.sa_user as saUser ,u.sa_name as saName ,isnull(f.PTC_PRO, 0) as prePtcPro ,(select team_dept_code from VW_SSO_DEPT where dept_code = u.sa_dept_new) as deptCode ,(select dept_name from IRIS_SSO_DEPT where dept_code = b.DEPT_UPER ) as uperdeptName from IRIS_MM_CLS a left outer join IRIS_SSO_USER u on u.sa_exps <> 'D' and u.sa_sabun_new = a.sa_sabun_new left outer join ( SELECT bb.PRJ_CD ,bb.WBS_CD ,bb.PRJ_NM ,bb.PRJ_STR_DT ,bb.PRJ_END_DT ,bb.DEPT_UPER ,0 AS seq FROM IRIS_MM_CLS aa JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST bb ON (aa.PRJ_CD = bb.PRJ_CD AND aa.WBS_CD = bb.WBS_CD) WHERE 1 = 1 UNION SELECT bb.PRJ_CD ,dd.WBS_CD_P AS WBS_CD ,bb.PRJ_NM + dd.wbs_cd_p_nm AS PRJ_NM ,bb.PRJ_STR_DT ,bb.PRJ_END_DT ,bb.DEPT_UPER ,seq FROM IRIS_MM_CLS aa JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST bb ON (aa.PRJ_CD = bb.PRJ_CD AND aa.WBS_CD = bb.WBS_CD) JOIN IRIS_PRJ_RSST_DST dd ON (bb.PRJ_CD = dd.PRJ_CD AND bb.WBS_CD = dd.WBS_CD AND dd.DEL_YN = 'N' AND #{searchMonth} >= left(dd.PATC_STR_DT, 7) ) WHERE aa.WBS_CD IN (bb.WBS_CD, dd.WBS_CD_P) AND bb.PRJ_CD = dd.PRJ_CD AND bb.WBS_CD = dd.WBS_CD ) b on b.PRJ_CD = a.PRJ_CD AND b.WBS_CD = a.WBS_CD left outer join IRIS_TSS_MGMT_MST c on c.DEL_YN ='N' and c.TSS_CD = a.TSS_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN IRIS_MM_CLS F ON F.TSS_CD = A.TSS_CD and F.prj_cd = a.prj_cd and F.WBS_CD = a.WBS_CD AND F.SA_SABUN_NEW = A.SA_SABUN_NEW AND F.MM_YYMM = convert(nvarchar(7), dateadd(mm, -1, convert(datetime, #{searchMonth}+'-01')), 23)
where a.MM_YYMM = #{searchMonth} ) m where 1=1 and (m.saName <> '' or m.saName is not null)
AND m.deptCode = (select team_dept_code from vw_sso_dept where dept_code = #{_userDept})
and m.prjNm like '%'+#{searchDeptName}+'%'
and m.ptcPro = 0
and m.clsYn = #{selClsYn}
order by m.prjCd, m.saName
-- retrieveJoinProject M/M 마감 목록조회 SELECT PRJ_CD as prjCd FROM IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST WHERE DEPT_CD = #{_userDept}

/*retrieveMmInTodoList M/M입력 To-Do 대상 뷰리스트 조회*/ SELECT A.TODO_SYS_CD as todoSysCd /* 시스템코드 */ , A.TODO_TYPE_CD as todoTypeCd /* ToDo 업무코드 */ , A.TODO_REQ_NO as todoReqNo /* 사용자 Unique 값(MW_TODO_REQ_NO) */ , A.TODO_REQ_NM as todoReqNm /* ToDo 업무명 (국문) */ , A.TODO_REQ_EMP_NO as todoReqEmpNo /* ToDo알림발송자사번 */ , A.TODO_REQ_DT as todoReqDt /* ToDo등록시각 */ , A.TODO_END_DT as todoEndDt /* ToDo마감시간 */ , A.TODO_STATUS as todoStatus /* 처리상황명 */ , A.TODO_EMP_NO as todoEmpNo /* 처리담당자 ID */ , A.TODO_SGN_EMP_NO as todoSgnEmpNo /* 수임담당자ID(실제처리자) */ , A.TODO_RESULT as todoResultYn /* Todo 완료여부 */ FROM dbo.VM_MM_IN A WHERE A.TODO_REQ_NO = #{todoReqNo} AND A.TODO_EMP_NO = #{todoEmpNo}

/*retrieveMmClsTodoList M/M마감 To-Do 대상 뷰리스트 조회*/ SELECT A.TODO_SYS_CD as todoSysCd /* 시스템코드 */ , A.TODO_TYPE_CD as todoTypeCd /* ToDo 업무코드 */ , A.TODO_REQ_NO as todoReqNo /* 사용자 Unique 값(MW_TODO_REQ_NO) */ , A.TODO_REQ_NM as todoReqNm /* ToDo 업무명 (국문) */ , A.TODO_REQ_EMP_NO as todoReqEmpNo /* ToDo알림발송자사번 */ , A.TODO_REQ_DT as todoReqDt /* ToDo등록시각 */ , A.TODO_END_DT as todoEndDt /* ToDo마감시간 */ , A.TODO_STATUS as todoStatus /* 처리상황명 */ , A.TODO_EMP_NO as todoEmpNo /* 처리담당자 ID */ , A.TODO_SGN_EMP_NO as todoSgnEmpNo /* 수임담당자ID(실제처리자) */ , A.TODO_RESULT as todoResultYn /* Todo 완료여부 */ FROM dbo.VM_MM_CLS A WHERE A.TODO_REQ_NO = #{todoReqNo} AND A.TODO_EMP_NO = #{todoEmpNo}

mapper.select: -- retrievePrjLeaderEmpNo select pl_emp_no from IRIS_PRJ_RSST_MST where DEPT_CD = (select team_dept_code from VW_SSO_DEPT where dept_code = #{_userDept}) and (PRJ_END_DT is null OR PRJ_END_DT = '')
-- retrieveMmClsRealDeptCode select sa_dept_new as deptCode from IRIS_SSO_USER where sa_sabun_new = #{saSabunNew}
